description.description: A Melee attacker specializing in CRIT DMG and counterattacks

introduction.introduction:
Joo Shiyoon has cut off the old chains of anguish and completed himself. A Striker specializing in countering enemies' Basic and Special skill attacks, he's armed with the Dragon Fang and Yeonhwa, the sword-and-sheath pair that's been handed down among the Truth Seeker bloodline.
He's always been an unreadable enigma to those around him. Even he himself didn't know what he wanted.
He had scores to settle, but he was reluctant. He wanted to forgive his enemy, but he couldn't find a reason to.
Then, he was forced to face his dilemma at the border between life and death, and his aimless wandering was over. He was freed from the old pain that had tormented him for a long time. He's found enlightenment.
Now, he no longer hesitates to draw the sword that he received from his mother. Nor quietly excuses himself from the battle scene without the others knowing. Instead, he now fights at the front lines, protecting his friends at the most critical moment.
But of course, he claims that nothing about him has changed.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Swings a secondary sword hidden in Yeonhwa, inflicting AoE damage in front.

Every 4th CRIT attack casts a buff, during which incoming Basic attacks trigger AoE counterattacks that first target enemies in the rear. Counterattacks pause CRIT count for 4 seconds, but nullify debuffs for the same duration.

level5.level5: Counterattacks inflict True DMG, sealing targets' skills for 4 s. (Bosses excluded)

baseDescription.baseDescription: Ignores damage from Hitstun caused by attacks other than Ultimate skills, and inflicts AoE damage in front. Stuns targets for 4 seconds. This skill decreases Joo Shiyoon's Skill Haste by 25% for 6 seconds when cast, but also casts Perfect EVA on him for the same duration.

level5.level5: Skill cooldown -6 s upon Passive counterattacks

baseDescription.baseDescription: Swings a sword, following his heart, inflicting AoE damage in front. The skill deals additional damage equal to 15% of the target's current HP. Casts Perfect EVA for 12 seconds when cast.

level5.level5: Skill cooldown -6 s upon Passive counterattacks
